plot outline: Arivu, the unemployed youngster has an aim to find a girlfriend.Whenever he expresses his love to a girl, she will get married to some other guy. With his move backfiring each time, Arivu challenges his friends that he will make a girl fall for him and he will settle with her in life. Arivu has lost all hope, until he sets eyes on Savitri, a cop. Finally, he finds her girlfriend. When everything seems to fall in place, bad luck seems to follow him.He starts facing problem from the girl,whom he proposed in his past. Whether he solved the problem? Will he marry the girl he loves? are the answers to the climax.
title: Ivan Yarendru Therikiratha
plot: Arivu, the unemployed youngster has an aim to find a girlfriend.Whenever he expresses his love to a girl, she will get married to some other guy. With his move backfiring each time, Arivu challenges his friends that he will make a girl fall for him and he will settle with her in life. Arivu has lost all hope, until he sets eyes on Savitri, a cop. Finally, he finds her girlfriend. When everything seems to fall in place, bad luck seems to follow him.He starts facing problem from the girl,whom he proposed in his past. Whether he solved the problem? Will he marry the girl he loves? are the answers to the climax.::Manow Shelvaraj
